nodes.text: Micha was a female pilot who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Imperial Era, holding the callsign Red Four in Red Squadron.

During a battle against the Galactic Empire, sometime between 2 BBY and 4 ABY, Micha chose to crash her X-wing starfighter into Darth Vader, a Sith Lord and enforcer of Emperor Palpatine, sacrificing her own life in an attempt to kill him. While the other rebels present during the battle assumed Vader had perished in the crash, the Sith Lord had survived, and used the Force to throw the wreckage aside, proceeding to attack the rebels.

Micha was first mentioned in "Red Four," a one-page comic story written by Charles Soule and published in Marvel Comics 1000, a comic book published by Marvel Comics on August 28, 2019 in celebration of the company's eightieth anniversary.
